attributes.action: Approve Work visas scheme to 2019-2020 Enrolled Foreign students.
attributes.additional_details: Earlier this week, Home Office published documents regarding two years stay back for foreign students who will be enrolling for their courses from 2020-2021. We kindly requesting government to consider the stay back to extend to the current students as well who had enrolled for their courses during 2019-2020
attributes.background: Extend 2 Years Stay back to foreign students who ever Graduated 2019-2020 Period.
